name: tm85
effect: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An attack that works only on a
sleeping foe. It absorbs half the
damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
An attack that works only on a
sleeping foe. It absorbs half the
damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
An attack that works only on a
sleeping foe. It absorbs half the
damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping
target. It absorbs half the damage
caused to heal its own HP.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target.
It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its
own HP.

The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target.
It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its
own HP.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user yells as if it’s ranting about something,
which lowers the Sp. Atk stats of opposing Pokémon.
